column1: Kata Robata////Kata Robata is one of our favorite sushi restaurants in Houston - the quality of the fish is always excellent
column2: there is a large variety on the menu
column3: and the prices are not crazy.  It's a good spot to go with your beloved
column4: or with a group of friends
column5: just make sure you get there early if you are going with a large group (especially on a Friday or Saturday night)
column6: because the place gets packed!  There is a small bar at the front of the restaurant
column8: so getting drinks while waiting may take a bit.
